IServerSocket

Socket interface.

See Also

ServerSocket WIN32ServerSocket LinuxServerSocket

Functions
Init
virtual int Init() = 0

Initializes socket on given port that accepts request that are smaller or equal in length that request buffer length.

Returns

0 if initialized successfully.

Listen
virtual int Listen() = 0

Starts listening for incoming http requests.

Returns

0 if received request without body, else request body length.

GetRequest
virtual HttpRequest GetRequest() = 0
Returns

Request data as HttpRequest object.

SendResponse
virtual int SendResponse(
std::shared_ptr<HttpResponse> response
) const = 0
Parameters
response
std::shared_ptr<HttpResponse>

HttpResponse object that will be send back.

Returns

0 if response was sent successfully, else 1.
